snippet: In the early hours of Saturday morning in the United States, Black Caviar, a superstar mare in Australia, did what she has always done; she won another race, her 21st consecutive.
abstract: In the early hours of Saturday morning in the United States, Black Caviar, a superstar mare in Australia, did what she has always done; she won another race, her 21st consecutive.

headline.main: Australia's Superstar Mare Does It Again
